data.text: “Sɔre, hyerɛn, na wo hann aba,
Hwɛ, esum akata asase so
Amanaman bɛba wo hann no mu,
“Ma wʼani so na hwɛ wo ho hyia:
Afei wobɛhwɛ na wʼanim ate,
Yoma akuakuo bɛyɛ wʼasase so ma,
Wɔbɛboaboa Kedar nnwankuo nyinaa ano abrɛ wo,
“Hwannom ne yeinom a wɔtu sɛ omununkum,
Ampa ara nsupɔ no ani da me so;
“Ananafoɔ bɛto wʼafasuo no bio,
Wʼapono ano bɛdeda hɔ ɛberɛ biara,
Na ɔman anaa ahennie a wɔrensom wo no bɛyera,
“Lebanon animuonyam bɛba wo nkyɛn,
Wo nhyɛsofoɔ mmammarima bɛba abɛkoto wo;
“Ɛwom sɛ wɔapa wʼakyi atane wo,
Wobɛnom amanaman nufosuo no
Mede sikakɔkɔɔ bɛsi kɔbere anan mu abrɛ wo,
Wɔrente awurukasɛm wɔ wʼasase so bio,
Owia renyɛ wo hann adekyeɛ mu bio
Wʼawia rentɔ bio,
Na afei wo nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa bɛyɛ teneneefoɔ
Mo mu akumaa koraa bɛdɔre ayɛ apem,
